name: Bounty Board Access
description: View available bounties for monsters, fugitives, or targets posted by nobles, merchants, or city guards.

name: Tracking & Scouting Services
description: Hire skilled trackers to scout dangerous terrain, follow a target, or map out unexplored regions.

name: Combat Drills & Sparring
description: Train with experienced warriors in live combat scenarios or skill-based duels to improve martial prowess.

name: Beast Handling Certification
description: Earn credentials proving you are licensed and capable of handling exotic or dangerous beasts.

name: Monster Identification & Consultation
description: Bring back remains or descriptions of a creature for identification, strategic advice, or bounty eligibility.

name: Assassination Contract (Member Only)
description: High-risk elimination contracts are assigned only to vetted guild operatives under strict codes of conduct.

name: Infiltration & Surveillance Services
description: Hire skilled agents to monitor, follow, or infiltrate a person, location, or organization.

name: Forged Credentials & Disguises
description: Obtain high-quality false papers, identities, or appearances for covert operations or travel.

name: Guild-Sponsored Expedition Slots
description: Join an officially sanctioned expedition to unexplored or hostile regions under guild protection.
price: Free for members; 100+ gp for non-members

name: Trap-Making & Countermeasures Workshop
description: Train in constructing or dismantling traps of all varieties, from wilderness snares to arcane wards.
